description:
Hagal is a Sezan, one of the Queen`s bodyguards.
Witnessing his skills and prowess of his fast feet, he recruits http://anidb.net/ch16874 [Ial] to the sezan, and assumes the role of his mentor.
Much later, Hagal is branded as a traitor to the Sezan, and meets his end tragically by the blade of his proteg√©, Ial.
name: Hagal
